title: Sci-Fi Spacecraft Sound Library
description: Effortlessly traverse land and space with over 900 futuristic vehicle and spacecraft sounds.
longDescription:
Sci-Fi Spacecraft brings together hundreds of hours of sound design work into one easy to use and versatile package, ready to bring sci-fi worlds to life!




Watch the trailer


Take players on a journey with:


Spacecraft engine loops (190 sounds)

  • Seamless loops for all manner of small to giant craft, from hovering bots to anti-gravity racers and motherships; burbly alien anomalies to rotor blades slicing through the air.
  • Use loops individually or layer them for huge variety – combining just 3 loops gives you 6,859,000 possible spacecraft sounds!
  • Experiment with driving layered loops' pitch and amplitude with different parameters (speed, acceleration, pitch, yaw, etc.) for a satisfyingly dynamic setup with minimal effort.


Thrusters (99 sounds)

One-shot and looping thrusters – from clean and airy propulsion to coarse and crackly jets of flame.


Boost (178 sounds)

Boost and energy pads/gates similar to those in futuristic racing games, and other rapid propulsion effects.


Collision/impact sounds (71 sounds)

For collisions with asteroids, other spacecraft, and obstacles/barriers.


Turbine (118 sounds)

Engine/jet spin up/down sounds – also useful for charge-up effects.


Takeoff and Landing (55 sounds)

Set off for the skies and touch down safely on uncharted planets with this collection of sounds.


Air and Wind (33 sounds)

Convey the rush of piloting a craft as it whooshes by an alien megastructure and through obstacles; warn of air and gas leaks; or introduce the relentless buffeting of wind on a craft's cockpit window.


Ambience (20 sounds)

Cut through the silence of space with these looping ambiences for ship interiors and external expanses.


Fly-bys (176 sounds)

A selection of cinematic fly-bys for environmental ambience, trailers and cutscenes, from the companion library Sci-Fi Fly By.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 941

Number of Audio Cues: 941

Sample rate / bit rate: 48kHz / 24-bit (Unreal 5.4 and above); 44kHz / 16-bit (Unreal 4.17 to 5.3)

Do Sound FX loop: Yes – mix of one-shot and looping sound effects

Supported Development Platforms: All

Documentation: PDF manual
